entities.name: Articque
entities.description: Target company of Project INUK. This page provides an overview of Articque's activities and its use of best-in-class development tools.

entities.transactionPerimeter: Concerns Articque and ChapsVision. Likely relates to a potential transaction involving Articque.

entities.description: Company associated with Project Inuk, as mentioned in the page footer. Potentially an interested party or acquirer in the context of Project Inuk.
